title: First software update for the Samsung Galaxy S22 brings March 2022 patches and stability improvements
content:
Samsung has barely taken the wraps off the Galaxy S22 series, and the first update for the lineup has already started rolling out. The OTA brings in several optimizations and enhancements, but the main change in the new build is the inclusion of March 2022 Android security patches. Screenshot credit: XDA Senior Member Nmc_alvesÂ® The

The post First software update for the Samsung Galaxy S22 brings March 2022 patches and stability improvements appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Galaxy S22 is now receiving its first software update, packed with the March 2022 security patches and other fixes. Read on to know more!
